# filter pages and documents for the noindex key
# robotstxt.org - if `_config` production variable is false, robots will be disallowed.


User-agent: *



Disallow: /404.html

Disallow: /feed.xml

Disallow: /search/

Disallow: /assets/css/main.css

Disallow: /search.json


Disallow: /articles/What-do-porcelain-and-plumbing-mean-in-Git-kor/

Disallow: /project/centos-firewalld/



Sitemap: http://djkeh.github.io/sitemap.xml
